main.warnWrongSystem: NPC Button (D&D 5e) is designed for the dnd5e system.

dataLoader.warnMissingData: NPC Button: Missing or empty data ({fields}). Using fallbacks where possible.

cache.warnNoPacksToBuild: NPC Button: No compendium packs available for cache build.
cache.infoBuildStarted: NPC Button: Building compendium cache ({count} packs)...
cache.infoBuildProgress: NPC Button: Cache build progress: {done}/{total} packs.
cache.errorWriteFailed: NPC Button: Failed to write compendium cache.

openAiEnabled.name: OpenAI flavor switch (legacy)
openAiEnabled.hint: Legacy compatibility switch. OpenAI is auto-enabled when an API key exists on this GM browser.

openAiModel.name: OpenAI model
openAiModel.hint: Model name used for NPC flavor generation.

openAiImageModel.name: OpenAI image model
openAiImageModel.hint: Model name used for AI token image generation.

openAiBaseUrl.name: OpenAI API base URL
openAiBaseUrl.hint: Advanced: leave default unless using a compatible endpoint.

openAiMaxBatch.name: OpenAI max NPCs per generation
openAiMaxBatch.hint: Limits how many NPCs per click are sent to OpenAI to control cost and latency.

openAiApiKeyMenu.name: OpenAI API Key
openAiApiKeyMenu.label: Set API Key
openAiApiKeyMenu.hint: Stored locally in this browser (client setting), never synced to the world database.

apiKeyForm.title: NPC Button: OpenAI API Key
apiKeyForm.saved: NPC Button: OpenAI API key saved for this browser.
apiKeyForm.cleared: NPC Button: OpenAI API key cleared.
apiKeyForm.storedNote: Stored only in this browser as a client setting for this GM user.
apiKeyForm.maskedNote: Only a masked preview is shown.

openai.errorGmOnlyGeneration: Only GM users can call OpenAI generation.
openai.errorApiKeyMissing: OpenAI API key is not configured.
openai.errorGmOnlyTokenGeneration: Only GM users can call OpenAI token generation.
openai.errorNoUsableImageData: OpenAI image response did not contain usable image data.
openai.errorParseJsonResponse: Failed to parse OpenAI JSON response.

ui.errorRequiresDnd5e: NPC Button requires the D&D 5e system.
ui.warnNoSpeciesCompendiumEntries: NPC Button: No species compendium entries found.

dialog.title: NPC Button (D&D 5e)
dialog.heroSubtitle: Fast setup for single NPCs and full encounters.
dialog.noteBoss: Use Boss for stronger stat budget and encounter presence.
dialog.noteEncounterCountAuto: Count auto-adjusts from party setup and difficulty.
dialog.noteEncounterFolderAuto: Encounter generation places actors in the next Encounter-N folder and balances tiers automatically.
dialog.lootPromptNote: Copy this prompt into ChatGPT and ask for JSON-only output.
dialog.lootImportDescription: Paste loot JSON (settings and/or item list).
dialog.noteLootSummary: Loot is generated from compendium items using type, budget, and tier filters.
dialog.shopPromptNote: Copy this prompt into ChatGPT and ask for JSON-only output.
dialog.shopExportNote: Current shop settings serialized as JSON.
dialog.shopImportDescription: Paste shop JSON (settings and/or item list).
dialog.noteShopSummary: Shop inventory is built from compendiums. Market mode mixes item categories.
dialog.questBoardCustomPromptPlaceholder: Optional: add constraints, style, locations, factions, taboo topics, etc.
dialog.questPromptNote: Copy this prompt into ChatGPT and ask for JSON-only output.
dialog.questImportDescription: Paste quest board JSON (object with quests array or plain quest array).
dialog.questBoardCountNote: Choose how many quests to generate on the board.
dialog.questBoardNote: With API key: one click creates the journal. Without key: use prompt + import JSON.
dialog.aiConfiguredForClient: OpenAI key is configured for this GM client.
dialog.aiSetKeyInSettings: Set your OpenAI API key in Module Settings (Set API Key menu).
dialog.aiCreateNpcNote: builds full NPCs (stats + gear + spells/features via compendium lookup).
dialog.chatGptPromptNote: Copy this prompt and use it in ChatGPT. Ask for JSON-only reply.
dialog.importJsonDescription: Paste JSON from ChatGPT (single NPC object or array of NPC objects). Import uses current dialog options for folder/encounter and toggles.

ui.infoPromptCopied: NPC Button: ChatGPT prompt copied to clipboard.
ui.errorOpenDialogFailed: NPC Button: Failed to open generator dialog. Check console.
ui.errorNoArchetypes: NPC Button: No archetypes found. Check data/archetypes.json.
ui.warnNoRaceEntries: NPC Button: No race entries found. Check your compendium packs.
ui.warnEnableUseAiFirst: NPC Button: Enable 'Use AI' to use Create AI NPC.
ui.warnAiFullRequiresApiKey: NPC Button: Full AI generation requires OpenAI API key in Module Settings on this GM browser.
ui.warnAiFullFailedFallback: NPC Button: OpenAI full generation failed for {count} NPC(s). Used local fallback generation.
ui.infoAiFullSkippedByBatch: NPC Button: Skipped full AI generation for {count} NPC(s) due to max batch setting.
ui.warnAiFlavorSkippedNotConfigured: NPC Button: OpenAI flavor skipped (enable OpenAI + set API key in Module Settings on this GM browser).
ui.warnAiFlavorFailedFallback: NPC Button: OpenAI flavor failed for {count} NPC(s). Used local flavor fallback.
ui.infoAiFlavorSkippedByBatch: NPC Button: Skipped OpenAI flavor for {count} NPC(s) due to max batch setting.
ui.warnAiTokenSkippedNotConfigured: NPC Button: OpenAI token skipped (enable OpenAI + set API key in Module Settings on this GM browser).
ui.warnAiTokenFailedFallback: NPC Button: OpenAI token failed for {count} NPC(s). Used local token fallback.
ui.infoAiTokenSkippedByBatch: NPC Button: Skipped OpenAI token for {count} NPC(s) due to max batch setting.
ui.infoAiItemsMatched: NPC Button: Matched {count} AI-requested item(s) from compendiums.
ui.warnAiItemsMissing: NPC Button: Could not match {count} AI-requested item(s) in compendiums.
ui.warnSpeciesApplyPartial: NPC Button: {count} NPC(s) were created without full species data. Check console.
ui.errorCreateNpcFailed: NPC Button: NPC generation failed. Check console.

quest.infoPromptCopied: NPC Button: Quest board prompt copied to clipboard.
quest.warnPasteJsonFirst: NPC Button: Paste quest board JSON first.
quest.errorImportFailed: NPC Button: Quest board import failed.
quest.errorImportFailedWithReason: NPC Button: Quest board import failed - {reason}
quest.errorGenerateFailed: NPC Button: Quest board generation failed.
quest.errorGenerateFailedWithReason: NPC Button: Quest board generation failed - {reason}
quest.warnApiUnavailableUsePrompt: NPC Button: OpenAI key is missing. Use Quest Prompt + Import JSON flow.
quest.infoBoardCreated: NPC Button: Quest board journal created: {name} ({count} quests).
quest.progressGenerating: Quest board: generating and creating journal
quest.boardFallbackSummary: The board offers leads with clear risks, tasks, and rewards for capable adventurers.
quest.questFallbackWho: A local patron requests help from proven adventurers.
quest.questFallbackWhat: Resolve the core threat before it harms the settlement.
quest.questFallbackTask1: Gather clues and identify the true source of the problem.
quest.questFallbackTask2: Reach the key location and confront active opposition.
quest.questFallbackTask3: Secure proof of resolution and report back.
quest.questFallbackGmDescription: Escalate pressure with a clock, conflicting NPC motives, and one reversible setback.
quest.questFallbackTwist: A trusted ally is withholding a critical piece of truth.
quest.rewardFallbackSummary: Coin, practical supplies, and local goodwill.

shop.warnNothingSelected: NPC Button: Enable at least one shop output (NPC and/or journal).
shop.warnCreationFailed: NPC Button: Failed to create shop. Check console.
shop.infoPromptCopied: NPC Button: Shop prompt copied to clipboard.
shop.infoExportCopied: NPC Button: Shop JSON copied to clipboard.
shop.infoImportApplied: NPC Button: Shop import applied. Items in JSON: {count}.
shop.warnPasteJsonFirst: NPC Button: Paste shop JSON first.
shop.warnImportItemsMissing: NPC Button: Failed to match imported items: {missing}. Matched: {resolved}.
shop.shopkeeperMotivation: Runs "{shop}" and negotiates every deal carefully.
shop.shopkeeperSpeech: Fair prices, steady quality. Browse what you need.
shop.emptyStock: No items available for the current filters.

loot.warnCreationFailed: NPC Button: Failed to create loot container. Check console.
loot.infoPromptCopied: NPC Button: Loot prompt copied to clipboard.
loot.infoImportApplied: NPC Button: Loot import applied. Items in JSON: {count}.
loot.warnPasteJsonFirst: NPC Button: Paste loot JSON first.
loot.warnImportItemsMissing: NPC Button: Failed to match imported loot items: {missing}. Matched: {resolved}.

ui.warnPasteJsonFirst: NPC Button: Paste NPC JSON first.
ui.errorImportFailedGeneric: NPC Button: Import failed. JSON invalid or incompatible.
ui.importErrorMustBeObjectOrArray: Imported JSON must be an object or an array of objects.
ui.importErrorBuildActorData: Failed to build actor data from imported JSON.
ui.importErrorNoEntriesParsed: No NPC entries were parsed from imported JSON.
ui.importErrorSchemaValidation: Invalid NPC JSON schema at entry #{index}: {details}

importPreview.title: NPC Import Preview
importPreview.description: Debug preview before import: incoming entries and compendium match results.
importPreview.summaryNoRows: NPCs: {npcs} | No compendium lookup entries detected in payload.

importSchema.entryMustBeObject: entry must be a JSON object
importSchema.fieldMustBeStringArray: field "{field}" must be an array of strings
importSchema.arrayItemMustBeString: field "{field}" item #{index} must be a string
importSchema.abilityMustBeNumber: field "{field}" must be a numeric ability score
importSchema.itemsMustBeArrayOrObject: field "items" must be an array of strings or an object of string arrays
